sections.title: Emerging Technologies and Future Engineering → Tecnologías emergentes e ingeniería futura

items.english: Quantum computing promises exponential advances in computational problem-solving capabilities
items.spanish: La computación cuántica promete avances exponenciales en capacidades de resolución de problemas computacionales

items.english: Artificial general intelligence represents the next frontier in machine cognition
items.spanish: La inteligencia artificial general representa la próxima frontera en cognición de máquinas

items.english: Brain-computer interfaces enable direct neural control of external devices
items.spanish: Las interfaces cerebro-computadora permiten control neural directo de dispositivos externos

items.english: Molecular manufacturing assembles products atom by atom with precision
items.spanish: La manufactura molecular ensambla productos átomo por átomo con precisión

items.english: Digital twins create virtual replicas for real-time monitoring and optimization
items.spanish: Los gemelos digitales crean réplicas virtuales para monitoreo y optimización en tiempo real

items.english: Synthetic biology engineers biological systems for novel applications
items.spanish: La biología sintética diseña sistemas biológicos para aplicaciones novedosas

items.english: Metamaterial engineering creates substances with properties not found in nature
items.spanish: La ingeniería de metamateriales crea sustancias con propiedades no encontradas en la naturaleza

items.english: Space elevators could revolutionize access to orbital and interplanetary destinations
items.spanish: Los elevadores espaciales podrían revolucionar acceso a destinos orbitales e interplanetarios

items.english: Fusion energy technology promises clean, abundant power generation
items.spanish: La tecnología de energía de fusión promete generación de energía limpia y abundante

items.english: Augmented reality overlays digital information onto physical environments seamlessly
items.spanish: La realidad aumentada superpone información digital sobre ambientes físicos sin problemas

options: It could solve complex optimization and simulation problems exponentially faster
It will replace all classical computers immediately
It only works for simple calculations

options: Direct neural control of machines and enhanced human-machine collaboration
They can read all human thoughts
They only work for medical applications

listening.audio: Why are digital twins important for future engineering systems?
options: They enable real-time monitoring, prediction, and optimization of complex systems
They replace all physical testing
They only work for simple devices

sections.title: Advanced Human Factors Engineering → Ingeniería avanzada de factores humanos

items.english: Ergonomic design principles optimize human-machine interfaces for safety and efficiency
items.spanish: Los principios de diseño ergonómico optimizan interfaces humano-máquina para seguridad y eficiencia

items.english: Cognitive load assessment evaluates mental workload in complex systems
items.spanish: La evaluación de carga cognitiva evalúa carga de trabajo mental en sistemas complejos

items.english: User experience design creates intuitive and satisfying product interactions
items.spanish: El diseño de experiencia de usuario crea interacciones de producto intuitivas y satisfactorias

items.english: Human error analysis identifies failure modes and prevention strategies
items.spanish: El análisis de error humano identifica modos de falla y estrategias de prevención

items.english: Biometric monitoring systems track physiological responses in real-time
items.spanish: Los sistemas de monitoreo biométrico rastrean respuestas fisiológicas en tiempo real

items.english: Accessibility design ensures products are usable by people with diverse abilities
items.spanish: El diseño de accesibilidad asegura que productos sean utilizables por personas con habilidades diversas

items.english: Situational awareness training improves operator performance in critical environments
items.spanish: El entrenamiento de conciencia situacional mejora rendimiento del operador en ambientes críticos

items.english: Anthropometric data guides design for human physical characteristics
items.spanish: Los datos antropométricos guían diseño para características físicas humanas

items.english: Workload distribution algorithms balance tasks among human operators
items.spanish: Los algoritmos de distribución de carga de trabajo equilibran tareas entre operadores humanos

items.english: Stress analysis methodologies evaluate human performance under pressure
items.spanish: Las metodologías de análisis de estrés evalúan rendimiento humano bajo presión

listening.audio: Why is cognitive load assessment important in system design?
options: It ensures operators aren't overwhelmed with information, improving safety and performance
It makes systems more complex
It eliminates all user interfaces

listening.audio: How does human error analysis improve system safety?
options: It identifies potential failure points and helps design error-prevention measures
It eliminates all human involvement
It blames operators for all problems

listening.audio: What role does accessibility design play in engineering?
options: It ensures products are usable by people with different abilities and limitations
It makes products more expensive
It only benefits disabled users

sections.title: Interdisciplinary Engineering Integration → Integración interdisciplinaria de ingeniería

items.english: Systems thinking approaches consider interactions between multiple engineering disciplines
items.spanish: Los enfoques de pensamiento sistémico consideran interacciones entre múltiples disciplinas de ingeniería

items.english: Multidisciplinary optimization coordinates design across different engineering domains
items.spanish: La optimización multidisciplinaria coordina diseño a través de diferentes dominios de ingeniería

items.english: Cross-functional collaboration integrates diverse expertise for complex projects
items.spanish: La colaboración cross-funcional integra experiencia diversa para proyectos complejos

items.english: Technology convergence creates new possibilities through disciplinary integration
items.spanish: La convergencia tecnológica crea nuevas posibilidades a través de integración disciplinaria

items.english: Concurrent engineering approaches coordinate simultaneous development activities
items.spanish: Los enfoques de ingeniería concurrente coordinan actividades de desarrollo simultáneas

items.english: Trade-off analysis balances competing objectives across system components
items.spanish: El análisis de trade-off equilibra objetivos competidores a través de componentes del sistema

items.english: Interface management ensures compatibility between different subsystems
items.spanish: La gestión de interfaces asegura compatibilidad entre diferentes subsistemas

items.english: Knowledge integration combines insights from multiple technical domains
items.spanish: La integración de conocimiento combina conocimientos de múltiples dominios técnicos

items.english: System architecture defines overall structure and component relationships
items.spanish: La arquitectura del sistema define estructura general y relaciones de componentes

items.english: Holistic design considers entire system lifecycle and stakeholder needs
items.spanish: El diseño holístico considera todo el ciclo de vida del sistema y necesidades de partes interesadas

listening.audio: Why is systems thinking important for complex engineering projects?
options: It considers interactions and dependencies between different parts of the system
It focuses only on individual components
It eliminates the need for specialization

listening.audio: How does concurrent engineering improve development efficiency?
options: It allows parallel development activities instead of sequential processes
It makes development take longer
It eliminates all collaboration

listening.audio: What challenges arise in multidisciplinary optimization?
options: Balancing different objectives and constraints from various engineering domains
All disciplines have identical objectives
It only works for simple problems

sections.title: Advanced Materials and Manufacturing Integration → Integración avanzada de materiales y manufactura

items.english: Materials informatics accelerates discovery through computational screening and prediction
items.spanish: La informática de materiales acelera descubrimiento a través de selección computacional y predicción

items.english: Process-structure-property relationships guide material design for specific applications
items.spanish: Las relaciones proceso-estructura-propiedad guían diseño de materiales para aplicaciones específicas

items.english: Advanced characterization techniques reveal material behavior at multiple scales
items.spanish: Las técnicas de caracterización avanzadas revelan comportamiento de materiales a múltiples escalas

items.english: Sustainable material selection considers environmental impact throughout lifecycle
items.spanish: La selección sostenible de materiales considera impacto ambiental a través del ciclo de vida

items.english: Manufacturing constraints influence material design and performance optimization
items.spanish: Las restricciones de manufactura influyen diseño de materiales y optimización de rendimiento

items.english: High-throughput experimentation enables rapid material property evaluation
items.spanish: La experimentación de alto rendimiento permite evaluación rápida de propiedades de materiales

items.english: Computational modeling predicts material behavior before physical testing
items.spanish: El modelado computacional predice comportamiento de materiales antes de pruebas físicas

items.english: Material genome initiatives systematize material discovery and development
items.spanish: Las iniciativas de genoma de materiales sistematizan descubrimiento y desarrollo de materiales

items.english: Quality control protocols ensure consistent material properties in production
items.spanish: Los protocolos de control de calidad aseguran propiedades consistentes de materiales en producción

items.english: Circular material flows minimize waste through recycling and reuse strategies
items.spanish: Los flujos circulares de materiales minimizan desperdicio a través de estrategias de reciclaje y reutilización

listening.audio: How does materials informatics change material development?

It eliminates all experimental work
It only works for simple materials

options: It enables rapid testing of many material compositions and conditions
It makes experiments more expensive
It eliminates the need for analysis

sections.title: Global Engineering Ethics and Responsibility → Ética global de ingeniería y responsabilidad

items.english: Engineering ethics frameworks guide professional conduct in complex global contexts
items.spanish: Los marcos de ética de ingeniería guían conducta profesional en contextos globales complejos

items.english: Social impact assessment evaluates engineering projects' effects on communities
items.spanish: La evaluación de impacto social evalúa efectos de proyectos de ingeniería en comunidades

items.english: Sustainable development goals align engineering practice with global priorities
items.spanish: Los objetivos de desarrollo sostenible alinean práctica de ingeniería con prioridades globales

items.english: Technology assessment analyzes broader implications of engineering innovations
items.spanish: La evaluación de tecnología analiza implicaciones más amplias de innovaciones de ingeniería

items.english: Cultural sensitivity ensures appropriate technology transfer and implementation
items.spanish: La sensibilidad cultural asegura transferencia e implementación apropiada de tecnología

items.english: Risk communication bridges technical expertise and public understanding
items.spanish: La comunicación de riesgo conecta experiencia técnica y comprensión pública

items.english: Environmental justice addresses equitable distribution of technological benefits
items.spanish: La justicia ambiental aborda distribución equitativa de beneficios tecnológicos

items.english: Professional responsibility extends beyond technical competence to societal impact
items.spanish: La responsabilidad profesional se extiende más allá de competencia técnica a impacto social

items.english: Whistleblower protection safeguards engineers reporting safety or ethical concerns
items.spanish: La protección de denunciantes salvaguarda ingenieros reportando preocupaciones de seguridad o éticas

items.english: Global collaboration requires understanding diverse ethical and cultural frameworks
items.spanish: La colaboración global requiere comprensión de marcos éticos y culturales diversos
